MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 06-DEC-2020 01:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the FK8 postcode area of Stirling. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30pm to make a repair to an underground cable fault at Allan Park and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:03pm on 5th December 2020.
